answers.answer: Tell me about your diet and your daily routine... perhaps your hunger can be attributed to your everyday habits. Do you have any pre-existing illness?

I eat almost 4 times a day . I work continuously for about 10 to 11 hours . Even then I do not skip my food . . And I don eat junk outside. I eat healthy home food   everytime. Even then I feel very weak all the time in the recent days.   I cannot  talk to a person constantly face to face I feel dizzy n I get sudden feeling of unconsciousness which I.am very tensed and scared. . I do not have any pre existing  illness as such other than this .

question: Hi I.'ve been suffering from frequent hunger all the time. ..I.'ve been tested negative for diabetes . Not able to concentrate on my work and have lost hopes . Every doctor I visit ends up giving some multivitamin tonic which is not at solving my problem . It's awful when I cant control hunger and starts feeling dizzy soon . I.'ve always been dependant on my mother . Totally lost in this problem and not able to concentrate on my work and career.Badly in need of a solution :-(
title: frequent hunger during day and night
